mobile.name: goblin slave
mobile.long_description: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
mobile.description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

mobile.name: drow commoner
mobile.long_description: A drow commoner is here, walking around on guard duty.
mobile.description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

mobile.name: drow noble warrior
mobile.long_description: A drow warrior stands here guarding his home.

mobile.name: drow noble mage
mobile.long_description: A drow mage is here protecting his home.
mobile.description: The mage prepares to cast a spell... at you!!

mobile.name: drow priestess
mobile.long_description: A drow priestess is here shouting orders.
mobile.description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

mobile.name: drow master
mobile.long_description: A drow master stares at you angrily.
mobile.description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

mobile.name: drow weaponsmaster
mobile.long_description: A drow weaponsmaster is here shadow boxing.
mobile.description: He definitely know his way around in combat.

mobile.name: drow matron mother
mobile.long_description: The Matron Mother of the house is standing here.
mobile.description: She looks really and truly annoyed that you have found your way here.

mobile.name: drow matron mother
mobile.long_description: The Matron Mother of the first house is waiting for you.
mobile.description: She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it.

mobile.name: drider
mobile.long_description: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
mobile.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

mobile.name: drider
mobile.long_description: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
mobile.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

mobile.name: yochlol
mobile.long_description: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist...
mobile.description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.
